title: "Repent, Harlequin!" Said the Ticktockman
description: In a thirtieth anniversary edition of the classic, the Harlequin, a rebel, inhabits a world where conformity and punctuality are top priorities, and the Ticktockman cannot accept the Harlequin's presence in his perfectly ordered world. 25,000 first printing. IP.
author: Harlan Ellison
